mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report ( rep_code, rep_category, m_code, rep_title, rep_content, created_at ) VALUES ( 'REP' || LPAD(report_seq.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{rep_category}, #{m_code}, #{rep_title}, #{rep_content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT rep_code, rep_category, m_code, rep_title, rep_content, created_at FROM report ORDER BY created_at DESC
